content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received a command to write tests for a specific code and added a test case for the existing code with a focus on the addition functionality. My previous command was to browse the website https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Artificial_intelligence and gather information on the different types of artificial intelligence. The website provided an overview of AI including its definition, history, sub-fields, approaches, techniques, and tools used, as well as its applications, philosophical debates, limitations, risks, and development. Some sources provide a comprehensive list of different types of AI, while others touch on the topic but do not provide a specific categorization.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-61742229", "question": "What is the main topic of the article?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : an error message indicating that the requested webpage or resource cannot be found. The main topic of the article cannot be determined as there is no article provided, only an error message.', type='action_result')]
"""
